question.title: Question 1
question.questiontext: What is more important?

answer.answertext: Bravery
Intelligence
Kindness
Achievement

question.title: Question 2
question.questiontext: What would you rather learn about?

answer.answertext: Quidditch
Alchemy
Transfiguration
Potions

question.title: Question 3
question.questiontext: What color do you prefer

answer.answertext: Red
Blue
Yellow
Green

question.title: Question 4
question.questiontext: Which animal would you prefer?

answer.answertext: Owl
Rat
Cat
Snake

question.title: Question 5
question.questiontext: If you found $2000 what would you do?

answer.answertext: Turn it in
Depends on who is watching
Ask around to see if anyone is missing it
Pocket it. Finders keepers!

question.title: Question 6
question.questiontext: Which trait describes you?

answer.answertext: Brave
Clever
Loyal
Cunning

question.title: Question 7
question.questiontext: Your friend has a problem- they're being picked on. What do you do?

answer.answertext: Rush in without thinking and defend them!
Formulate a brilliant plan to help them.
Run and get a teacher, they'll be able to help more than you.
Consider carefully... what do you get out of this.

question.title: Question 8
question.questiontext: If you saw a sign on a door telling you not to enter, what would you do?

answer.answertext: Go in anyway, probably something awesome in there.
Leave it alone. That sign is probably there for a reason.
Leave quickly and don't look back.
Laugh and head on it!

question.title: Question 9
question.questiontext: What would your family say is your worst trait?

answer.answertext: Reckless-you don't think before you act
A bit of a know-it-all
You're too nice for your own good
They wouldn't because you don't have any...

question.title: Question 10
question.questiontext: Which of these would be your perfect way to spend the day?

answer.answertext: Go on an adventure
Read
Spend time with friends and family
Shop, maybe a bit of harmless banter

question.title: Question 11
question.questiontext: Someone steals money from you. They're poor and really need it. What do you do?

answer.answertext: Grumble about them stealing and offer them another 20
Calculate a way for them to get help, let them keep it after telling them off a bit.
You let them keep it, befriend them, and offer them your coat.
Who care's if they're poor? That money is yours and no one takes what belongs to you!

question.title: Question 12
question.questiontext: If you could have a superpower, which would you have?

answer.answertext: Super Strength
Insight, the ability to know whats coming
Invisibility
Mind Control

question.title: Question 13
question.questiontext: What is your perfect home?

answer.answertext: a Cabin in the woods, near lots of adventure
A house of mostly brick, with an internal library and cozy fireplace
A small home near friends and family.
A grand palace that comes with help

question.title: Question 14
question.questiontext: You have the opportunity to cheat off your friend on a test. What do you do?

answer.answertext: Decline, and tell them to be careful so they don't get in trouble.
Confront the friend after the test and advise them to turn themselves in.
Good for them, they beat the system. Decline the opportunity.
Don't ask questions and copy away!

question.title: Question 15
question.questiontext: Your friend calls you at 2am in desperate need of a ride, but you've had a long day and you're very tired, what do you do?

answer.answertext: Depends on who it is, but for most people I would do it.
I'll do it, but depending on how far it is I may need to charge for gas.
No hesitation, grab the keys and ask for their location.
Make up a lie, they can find a different ride

question.title: Question 16
question.questiontext: Someone at school played a harmless, but humiliating prank on you. Everyone is laughing at you. How do you react?

answer.answertext: Laugh along with them, it's only a joke
Laugh on the outside, Hurt on the inside.
Run and hide.
Get angry, how dare they do that to me. My father will hear about this!

question.title: Question 17
question.questiontext: You are being accused of something you didn't do, how do you react?

answer.answertext: Tell them you didn't do it an move on.
Calmly give them reasons why you didn't do it.
Apologize for the mix up and see if there's anything you can do to help.
Get defensive!

question.title: Question 18
question.questiontext: You've won $10,000. what do you do with the money?

answer.answertext: Save it.
Invest it.
Donate it.
Spend it!

question.title: Question 19
question.questiontext: 2 of your friends are in a fist fight, what do you do?

answer.answertext: Try and diffuse the situation and make peace.
Pick a side and tell them off.
Try and mediate and get each side of the story.
Let it run its course, this is entertaining.

question.title: Question 20
question.questiontext: Pick a slogan that best describes yourself

answer.answertext: Do what scares you, all it takes is 30 seconds of bravery.
I think, therefore I am.
Do no harm, but take no rubbish.
I can and I will!
